<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">[Disrupt Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=79)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 331 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Bloodline**
[Psychopomp](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=13)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Fortitude

</row>

</column>

---

You lance the target with energy. You deal 1d6 positive damage plus your spellcasting ability modifier. The target must attempt a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save. If the creature critically fails the save, it is also [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for 1 round.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d6.
name: Disrupt Undead
